results.content:
Very good course to get started, great idea to start "marking down" a cheat sheet. If the teacher's notes were provided it would even be better but judging from the comments, they have never been made accessible.
Still good introduction, thank you.
results.content_html:
Very good course to get started, great idea to start "marking down" a cheat sheet. If the teacher's notes were provided it would even be better but judging from the comments, they have never been made accessible.

results.content: Very easy to follow and the content was delivered spectacularly.
results.content_html: Very easy to follow and the content was delivered spectacularly.

results.content:
Ottimo corso, molto veloce e diretto per l'apprendimento del MarkDown.

Forse il costo è un po' elevato rispetto alla quantità di contenuti, ma mi è piaciuto moltissimo... e  poi l'ho preso in offerta!
results.content_html:

results.content: The "Teachers Notes", referenced a couple of times, are missing. The downloadable ZIP file in Section 2. is somewhat hidden and does not include all the Links the Author is mentioning.

results.content: The references to teaching notes in the video - notes are not there. Would be helpful to include.

results.content: This course is well done!  Coupled with the instructor provided notes and cheat sheets to download as a reference.

results.content: Enjoyed the class. Byte sized lessons for maximum learning strength.
